claim(uint256).details: Allows claiming of rebases up to 50 epochs old      `Minter.updatePeriod()` must be called before claiming

params.tokenId: The token ID to claim for

params.tokenIds: The token IDs to claim for

returns._0: Whether or not the claim succeeded

claimable(uint256).details: Allows claiming of rebases up to 50 epochs old

returns.claimable_: The amount of rebases claimable for the given token ID

setMinter(address).details: Callable once by Minter only, Minter is immutable

checkpointToken().notice: Called by Minter to notify Distributor of rebases

claim(uint256).notice: Claims rebases for a given token ID

claimMany(uint256[]).notice: Claims rebases for a list of token IDs

claimable(uint256).notice: Returns the amount of rebases claimable for a given token ID

lastTokenTime().notice: The last timestamp Minter has called checkpointToken()

minter().notice: Address of Minter.sol         Authorized caller of checkpointToken()

setMinter(address).notice: Used to set minter once on initialization

timeCursorOf(uint256).notice: Timestamp of most recent claim of tokenId

token().notice: Address of token used for distributions (VELO)

tokenLastBalance().notice: Amount of token in contract when checkpointToken() was last called
